message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  How about $100?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
